name: Vibha Pesala

certifications.title: C Programming For Beginners - Master the C Language

education.degree: Bachelor's in Computers and Communication Engineering

projects.name: Image Segmentation: Tumor Detection
projects.description: This project uses advanced image analysis (segmentation) with a powerful U-net neural network to detect brain tumors early. It pinpoints the size and location for better treatment planning.

projects.name: Employee Management System using Java
projects.description: Designed and deployed an Employee Management System in Java, leading to the streamlining of HR operations and a notable boost in overall efficiency.

projects.name: Traffic Police Database Management using SQL
projects.description: Designed a Traffic Police Database Management System used to manage a states traffic police database and to keep track of all the fines and road accidents in a particular area or in the particular state. The system uses a Relational Database Management System (SQL) to store the data.

experiences.description: I gained two months of hands-on experience in data analytics with Python. I successfully manipulated and cleaned data sets in Excel, producing a variety of visualizations to identify trends and patterns.Raw data was effectively processed and refined to produce the required output.

Actively participated in a quizzing club, engaging in intellectual competitions and fostering a passion for knowledge and learning, while demonstrating strong teamwork and collaboration skills by working with fellow club members.

Humans of Manipal Jaipur is a page inspired by Humans of New York. Recruited and managed a team of opportunity seeking students, providing guidance and support throughout the year while demonstrating strong leadership skills by overseeing all events including logistics.

Prashraya Welfare Foundation (Team Aashraya) is a Section-8 non-profit organization dedicated to the overall well-being of all living beings. Actively participated in strategic planning sessions, providing valuable insights and recommendations for program development and expansion.

Successfully organised and lead a blood donation drive while coordinating with local hospitals and blood banks with a team of personally recruited volunteers to secure necessary resources and ensure a smooth donation process.
